name: Into the Abyss (itch) (alan luo)
description:
Slay the Spire meets Super Crate Box in this deckbuilding arcade platformer game. Frantically fight through waves of enemies as you manage your cards at the same time, taking respite between rooms to refine and improve your deck.

Features

  • Fast-paced arcade platforming and shooting
  • Lots of unique weapons and enemies to explore
  • Discover synergies between cards
  • Descend further and further into the Abyss!

Attributions

  • Font: mem https://github.com/oidoid/mem
  • Pixels: a lot of inspiration from @egordorichev, though I drew everything myself
  • Sound: SFXR
  • Programming, art, music - me!
